document.discussion_title: Lookind for a film set in the bayoux with a man looking for his dead broyher. A voodo
document.topic_text: Arts & Leisure ▸ Movies » Lookind for a film set in the bayoux with a man looking for his dead broyher. A voodo Lookind for a film set in the bayoux with a man looking for his dead broyher. A voodo Asked Today, 09:54 PM A film about a man looking for his broyjer. He keeps appearing in various stages of decay.a voodoo witch. A cursed policeman always chased by dogs.set in the deep south on the bayoux. Theme tune was istanbul not constantinople. Might be 1980s hedgewitch666 Fairly old film about a man who thought he saw his wife with another man [ 0 Answers ] I'm looking for an old-ish movie about a man who sees what he thinks is his wife in bed with another man. He gets angry and leaves but later in the film he finds out that it wasn't his wife but her look-alike sister. I don't recall much else happening other than somebody attempting to hijack his... Animated film, evolved machines, old man creator dies, man v machine war ensues [ 0 Answers ] I'm trying to find out the title of an old 80's or early 90's animated film that I remember scenes from as a kid. I probably watched it on Nickelodeon or HBO. There is a space colony where one of the scientists creates machines to help the colonists teraform the world. Some conflict ensues between...
